data.name: WalkinVR - Professional
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is required for all non-personal use of WalkinVR including Business, Research, Clinics, Foundations, Universities, Schools, Therapy Centers, and other Organisations.

More info available at http://www.walkinvrdriver.com/business

With this DLC following extra features are available:
  • Hand tracking with other than Xbox Kinect camera: Orbbec, Intel RealSense, Asus Xtion, Kinec Azure

With this DLC following extra features are in development:
  • Ability to create profiles for different players and switch between them.
  • Locally collecting and exporting movement data for further analysis.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This DLC is required for all non-personal use of WalkinVR including: Business, Research, Clinic, Foundations, Universities, Schools, Therapy Centers, and other Organisations. It contains also extra features for professional users.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
